name: Firefox 29+ Autohide Navigation Bar
description: It's based on xat's firefox-4-autohide-navigation-bar-alternative. I just make a few modification to allow it works in Firefox 29 and later as it was.
additional_info:
Supposed to work with Firefox's new UI Australis
Tested through Fx28 - Fx33

Screenshot is an animation GIF, it demonstrated
1. hover at the tab
2. Alt+D or Ctrl+L focus at urlbar
3. Ctrl+E focus at searchbar
